item.title: Example Guide
item.description: Guides lead a user through a specific task they want to accomplish, often with a sequence of steps. Writing a good guide requires thinking about what your users are trying to do.

item.title: Setting Up a Clean Architecture Solution

Create the foundation for a merchandise store application by setting up a Clean Architecture solution structure with the correct project dependencies, organizing all source code in a src directory.
